thread.title: Vegan award winners to be announced in Wolverhampton
thread.title_full: Vegan award winners to be announced in Wolverhampton

title: Vegan award winners to be announced in Wolverhampton
text:
Tweet 
An opportunity to recognise and celebrate the products, companies, organisations and campaign groups that make a difference to animals, the planet and veganism, the awards feature 16 different categories and will be presented on the Sunday of the West Midlands Vegan Festival. More Wolverhampton stories WATCH: Welcome to Coronation Meat as stars help out at Wolverhampton butchers 
Held at the Civic Hall next weekend, it will be the biggest vegan fest ever staged in the Midlands. It is the eighth year it has been run, and the first time it has been held over two days, with more than 5,000 people expected. For more information on events in and around the West Midlands click here . What do you think?
